Ballchasing.com Pro Player Navigation Helper
Enhance your experience on Ballchasing.com with this extension designed specifically for Rocket League players and enthusiasts. This tool injects custom buttons to streamline navigation to professional player profiles, making it easier to explore replays, stats, and insights from the pros. Perfect for anyone looking to improve their game by studying high-level play
